room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: Definitely a fun filled, mind boggling and challenging experience! I went with two friends for the island escape which was a lot of fun, definitely plan to try another room in the near future. Staff was great as well!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: I went with my family last week & we couldn't make it at the time but the guy who was there wait us & let us come in... I tried "island" & it was amaaaazing we did at the last minuteIt was amazing & l'll try it again for sure

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: We had an amazing time. Group of 5. Our Game Master was Emily and she was extremely helpful. I'm sure she was cracking up at us from the control room. We completed Island Escape.The only downfall of the place was the location with parking. I did not want to park in front of the building and get blocked in. Strangest parking lot I have ever seen. We ended up parking down the street a little bit and walking. Other than that, amazing experience.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: I did the island escape with some coworkers and we loved it!! It was challenging but we still managed to get out! Would definitely recommend for a small group outing for team building or just for fun. Can't wait to try out the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: Great team building exercise for all members on many levels. It takes a team effort of individuals with diverse backgrounds to make it out of the room.
